mapper.select:
SELECT t1.id , t1.biz_tab_name , t1.biz_type , t1.biz_inf_id , t1.biz_inf_name , t1.biz_task_type , t1.pro_instance_id , t1.start_pro_userid , t1.pro_instance_state , t1.task_state , t1.validate_state , t1.owner_id , t1.org_id , t1.create_time , t1.modify_time , t1.create_by , t1.modify_by , t1.remark , t1.is_hidden , t1.MODIFY_BY , t1.BIZ_INF_NO , t1.OVER_TIME , t1.REMIND_TIME FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RN FROM ( SELECT tt.* FROM jbpm4_biz_tab tt ,JBPM4_HIST_PROCINST hp
WHERE hp.state_!='active' and create_time <=TO_DATE(#{dateStr},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #{maxNum} ) t1 WHERE t1.RN >= #{startNum}

SELECT t1.id , t1.biz_tab_name , t1.biz_type , t1.biz_inf_id , t1.biz_inf_name , t1.biz_task_type , t1.pro_instance_id , t1.start_pro_userid , t1.pro_instance_state , t1.task_state , t1.validate_state , t1.owner_id , t1.org_id , t1.create_time , t1.modify_time , t1.create_by , t1.modify_by , t1.remark , t1.is_hidden , t1.MODIFY_BY , t1.BIZ_INF_NO , t1.OVER_TIME , t1.REMIND_TIME FROM jbpm4_biz_tab t1 ,JBPM4_HIST_PROCINST hp WHERE hp.ID_=t1.pro_instance_id and hp.end_<=to_date(#{str},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') and hp.state_!='active' and ROWNUM <= 500
select t1.config_value VALUE from sys_config t1 where t1.validate_state='1' and t1.config_code = #{code}
SELECT count(*) FROM jbpm4_biz_tab t1 ,JBPM4_HIST_PROCINST hp WHERE hp.ID_=t1.pro_instance_id and hp.end_<=to_date(#{str},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') and hp.state_!='active'
select count(*) from tabs t where t.TABLE_NAME='JBPM4_BIZ_TAB_OLD'
select count(*) from JBPM4_HIST_PROCINST hp where hp.id_=#{proInstanceId} and hp.state_='active'
mapper.insert:
insert into JBPM4_BIZ_TAB_OLD ( id , biz_tab_name , biz_type , biz_inf_id , biz_inf_name , biz_task_type , pro_instance_id , start_pro_userid , pro_instance_state , task_state , validate_state , owner_id , org_id , create_time , MODIFY_TIME , create_by , remark , is_hidden , MODIFY_BY , BIZ_INF_NO , OVER_TIME , REMIND_TIME
)( select bt.id , bt.biz_tab_name , bt.biz_type , bt.biz_inf_id , bt.biz_inf_name , bt.biz_task_type , bt.pro_instance_id , bt.start_pro_userid , bt.pro_instance_state , bt.task_state , bt.validate_state , bt.owner_id , bt.org_id , bt.create_time , bt.MODIFY_TIME , bt.create_by , bt.remark , bt.is_hidden , bt.MODIFY_BY , bt.BIZ_INF_NO , bt.OVER_TIME , bt.REMIND_TIME from JBPM4_BIZ_TAB bt,JBPM4_HIST_PROCINST hp where hp.ID_=bt.pro_instance_id and hp.end_<=to_date(#{str},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') and hp.state_!='active' )

insert into JBPM4_BIZ_TAB_TMP ( id , biz_tab_name , biz_type , biz_inf_id , biz_inf_name , biz_task_type , pro_instance_id , start_pro_userid , pro_instance_state , task_state , validate_state , owner_id , org_id , create_time , MODIFY_TIME , create_by , remark , is_hidden , MODIFY_BY , BIZ_INF_NO , OVER_TIME , REMIND_TIME
)( select bt.id , bt.biz_tab_name , bt.biz_type , bt.biz_inf_id , bt.biz_inf_name , bt.biz_task_type , bt.pro_instance_id , bt.start_pro_userid , bt.pro_instance_state , bt.task_state , bt.validate_state , bt.owner_id , bt.org_id , bt.create_time , bt.MODIFY_TIME , bt.create_by , bt.remark , bt.is_hidden , bt.MODIFY_BY , bt.BIZ_INF_NO , bt.OVER_TIME , bt.REMIND_TIME from JBPM4_BIZ_TAB bt,JBPM4_HIST_PROCINST hp where hp.ID_=bt.pro_instance_id and hp.end_<=to_date(#{str},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') and hp.state_!='active' )

insert into JBPM4_BIZ_TAB_OLD ( id , biz_tab_name , biz_type , biz_inf_id , biz_inf_name , biz_task_type , pro_instance_id , start_pro_userid , pro_instance_state , task_state , validate_state , owner_id , org_id , create_time , MODIFY_TIME , create_by , remark , is_hidden , MODIFY_BY , BIZ_INF_NO , OVER_TIME , REMIND_TIME )
SELECT #{item.id, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.bizTabName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.bizType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.bizInfId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.bizInfName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.bizTaskType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.proInstanceId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.startProUserid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.proInstanceState, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.taskState, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.validateState, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ownerId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.orgId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.modifyTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.createBy, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isHidden, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.modifyBy, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.bizInfNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.overTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.remindTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} from dual
mapper.update: create table JBPM4_BIZ_TAB_OLD as select * from jbpm4_biz_tab a where a.id=0
create table JBPM4_BIZ_TAB_TMP as select * from jbpm4_biz_tab a where a.id=0
mapper.delete: delete from JBPM4_BIZ_TAB t where exists (select temp.id from JBPM4_BIZ_TAB_TMP temp where t.id=temp.id)

delete from JBPM4_BIZ_TAB bt where bt.id in
#{item.id, jdbcType=DECIMAL}
